name: Buttermilk Oatmeal Muffins
author: LaurasFaves
summary: Hearty breakfast muffins made with quick oats and buttermilk are a great way to start the day.
directions: Mix oats and buttermilk in a large bowl; allow to rest for 15 minutes
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Grease 24 muffin cups or line with paper liners
Combine eggs, brown sugar, and butter in a small bowl; stir into oat mixture
Mix flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt in another bowl; stir into oat mixture until just moistened
Fill prepared muffin cups about 3/4 full
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean, 15 to 18 minutes
Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
